item.name: Form Controls (for <OBJECT> use the <CONTROL> pointer or the address of the control)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.PUSH() method triggers the button's OnPush event.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following script executes the script under button1 when its value is "Adams".
section.example: if dropkeyl1.value = "Adams" then button1.push() end if
